pgQuery: SELECT DISTINCT t.relname AS table_name, a.attname AS column_name, i.relname AS index_name, CASE WHEN i.relname ILIKE '%pk_%' THEN 'PRIMARY KEY' WHEN i.relname ILIKE 'uq_%' THEN 'UNIQUE' WHEN i.relname ILIKE 'fk_%' THEN 'FOREIGN KEY' WHEN i.relname ILIKE 'CHECK' THEN 'CHECK' WHEN i.relname ILIKE 'i_%' THEN 'INDEX' ELSE 'OTHER' END AS index_type FROM pg_class t JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = t.relnamespace JOIN pg_index idx ON t.oid = idx.indrelid JOIN pg_attribute a ON a.attnum = ANY(idx.indkey) AND a.attrelid = t.oid JOIN pg_class i ON idx.indexrelid = i.oid JOIN pg_index ic ON ic.indexrelid = i.oid JOIN pg_am am ON i.relam = am.oid WHERE t.relkind = 'r' AND n.nspname = 'dbo' AND t.relname NOT LIKE '%_202%' ORDER BY table_name, column_name;
sqlQuery: SELECT DISTINCT Lower(t.name) AS table_name, Lower(c.name) AS column_name, Lower(i.name) AS index_name, CASE WHEN i.name LIKE 'PK_%' THEN 'PRIMARY KEY' WHEN i.name LIKE 'UQ_%' THEN 'UNIQUE' WHEN i.name LIKE 'FK_%' THEN 'FOREIGN KEY' WHEN i.name LIKE 'CHECK' THEN 'CHECK' WHEN i.name LIKE 'I_%' THEN 'INDEX' ELSE 'OTHER' END AS index_type FROM sys.indexes AS i JOIN sys.index_columns AS ic ON i.object_id = ic.object_id AND i.index_id = ic.index_id JOIN sys.columns AS c ON ic.object_id = c.object_id AND ic.column_id = c.column_id JOIN sys.tables AS t ON i.object_id = t.object_id WHERE t.name NOT LIKE '%_202%' AND t.type = 'U' ORDER BY table_name, column_name;
